before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"31ap2","text":"How to use a micropipette - We will practice pipetting small volumes of colorful liquids using micropipettes. We will work together practicing this new skill to improve our technique. Before coming to the lab watch this 5-minute video, How to Micropipette, that demonstrates 3 key pipetting skills: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":236,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":236,"length":19}],"data":[]},{"key":"dn2ha","text":"How to hold a micropipette","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1ksto","text":"How to set a micropipette to a desired volume","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"btg90","text":"How to use the plunger and ejector of the micropipette to measure a desired volume of a reagent","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"noheb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"94303614474D11EDB54B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FJuceccl9Ns"}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"AC42C2FE474D11EDB54B0A58A9FEAC02","height":"312","id":"AC231E70474D11ED802FCDAA1FE255F6","is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":null,"nestedSelector":null,"original_name":null,"placeholder":"https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/FcNW2KBTVgJa-e23rPHmJm7g-e7kaRJeeU1nnzYvi8rZYVRPstEU9_2fWDy9uCvohJmXUon_6OZ4tS9WgKqLx7p2fyufiNr72MNYTWPTJqz2BNOrVeP_vdQ5jzIi9REf3sjOC2_GHgXHVhSyqtM48kPXOQnYyrlD5axPOZEwPYQhJg9qr_IMyHf_yw","shadow":false,"source":"https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/FcNW2KBTVgJa-e23rPHmJm7g-e7kaRJeeU1nnzYvi8rZYVRPstEU9_2fWDy9uCvohJmXUon_6OZ4tS9WgKqLx7p2fyufiNr72MNYTWPTJqz2BNOrVeP_vdQ5jzIi9REf3sjOC2_GHgXHVhSyqtM48kPXOQnYyrlD5axPOZEwPYQhJg9qr_IMyHf_yw","width":"435"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d22qd","text":"Overview and Goals","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9k3aq","text":"Lab micropipettes allow us to accurately transfer small volumes of liquids. Units to measure small volumes with micropipettes are: microliter (uL) and milliliter (mL). There are 1000 uL in 1 mL). Effectively using lab micropipettes is a valuable skill that takes practice! We will work together to learn and improve our pipetting to improve accuracy. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4o8br","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"47svt","text":"After completing this lab you will gain the following lab skills:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6r6ua","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a84sl","text":"Lab safety and proper personal protective equipment (PPE)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ddpfo","text":"Pipetting with micropipettes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3udc4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ov5m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"pe9u","text":"Reducing waste - micropipette tips - Pipetting best practices dictate that a new micropipette tip should be used every time you pipette a new volume of liquid. This can be very important in avoiding contamination in molecular biology. Unfortunately, this also creates a considerable amount of plastic waste. For this activity, to reduce unnecessary waste, we will reuse tips when only pipetting water. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":36}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"f0h9c","text":"One 2-20 μl micropipette (p20)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6fcdv","text":"Micropipette tips for p20","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fdokr","text":"One Pipette Practice Card from miniPCR bio","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4d7cp","text":"Chem wipes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"37uo9","text":"200 μl water (tap water is fine) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5tsb8","text":"80 μl blue micropipetting practice fluid","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"egcgr","text":"80 μl yellow micropipetting practice fluid","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9j734","text":"80 μl red micropipetting practice fluid ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1v192","text":"tip disposal container","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5p5f8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f3ftk","text":"Reference resources","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b4i7e","text":"In the lab, we will use Micropipetting Practice Cards from the company miniPCR bio. Our procedure has been adapted from the following Micropipette Mastery Activity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":24,"length":29},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":134,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":29},{"key":1,"offset":134,"length":29}],"data":[]},{"key":"t3bu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5t9aj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"817m0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6A5E5AF3474D11EDB54B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.minipcr.com/product/micropipetting-practice-cards"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6A5E5ABC474D11EDB54B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.minipcr.com/wp-content/uploads/miniPCR-Learning-Labs-Micropipetting-101-240919-Micropipetting-Mastery.pdf"}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9v19h","text":"To draw up liquid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"50ifg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9onpr","text":"Set volume using the volume adjustment wheel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"54lbg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"666gr","text":"Press a new tip onto the shaft","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"csse0","text":"Press plunger TO the FIRST STOP","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a90n4","text":"Dip tip into liquid ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1k7oa","text":"Slowly release the plunger to collect liquid into the tip. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3q3u","text":"To dispense sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3cikg","text":"Touch tip to dispensing container","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ft3gr","text":"Press plunger THROUGH to the SECOND STOP","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7bild","text":"Remove tip from liquid then release plunger","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d0m0h","text":"Dispose of tip using the tip ejector","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4thqv","text":"Read the volumes specified on the Micropipetting Practice Card and use your micropipette to add the correct amount of liquid to each circle. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"77vu8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3gm5l","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"28smj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9u8ek","text":"Try to be precise so that the liquid stays in the circle. ","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7lt7l","text":"If you have trouble, dry the spot with a paper towel and try again.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"60kg9","text":"If you have trouble, try using both hands. Dr. Sjogren has shaky hands and uses her non-dominant hand to stabilize the micropipette being held in her dominant hand.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8u8mc","text":"Try to pick up all of the liquid without leaving any behind. ","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"771lj","text":"Check to see if you can pick up all of the liquid without leaving any behind. There should be no space at the end of your pipette tip. ","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

that you have set up your card, your goal is to mix these dyes with great care and precision. To mix, you will gently pipette up and down to the micropipette's first stop 2-3 times. Only pipette through to your micropipette's second stop at the end to remove all liquid from your tip to avoid making any air bubbles. Follow the guidance below: ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2fj9g","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
